Expected Changes: ~50-80 lines added, installation.mdx grows from ~36 to ~120 lines. File Path: docs/content/docs/getting-started/installation.mdx. Estimated: 30 min. Validation: Installation page shows all 4 methods with Docker first, CLI commands documented, no broken links to other docs, frontmatter format correct.
